ygData.subject: Re: Killing Giants in your low 30ies
ygData.msgSnippet: ... who ... want ... Only having a 22nd level char as my highest, I may be wrong.. but are the risks worth taking? ... It s not just you.  I don t think I ll
ygData.messageBody:
> Wow, I really am beginning to feel like the only person left playing EQ
who
> doesn't kill druids, treants, guards, dwarves at the docks, gnomes, etc...
> Doesn't anyone care about faction anymore? Or is it just players don't
want
> to take risks anymore...

Only having a 22nd level char as my highest, I may be wrong.. but are the
risks worth taking?

> Now isn't it a lot more fun using the tools at our disposal to clear a
> dungeon then to stand around watching a couple of HG's beat on each other?
> Maybe it is just me...

It's not just you. I don't think I'll ever do that, except to test out
charm when (if) I get it. Mind you, I'm not really partial to dungeons, but
unfortunately a lot of lambent quest items are in them so I guess I'd better
start liking them. :)

-Gaelaian Galaenor, bard of the 22nd refrain, Tunare.
